lyric:
[00:13.700]I used to rule the world
[00:16.548]Seas would rise when I gave the word
[00:19.388]Now in the morning I sleep alone
[00:23.509]Sweep the streets I used to own
[00:40.700]I used to roll the dice
[00:44.550]Feel the fear in my enemy's eyes
[00:48.600]Listen as the crowd would sing:
[00:51.470]Now the old king is dead! Long live the king!
[00:54.620]One minute I held the key
[00:58.520]Next the walls were closed on me
[01:01.450]And I discovered that my castles stand
[01:05.360]Upon pillars of salt and pillars of sand
[01:09.300]I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
[01:13.010]Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
[01:16.500]Be my mirror my sword and shield
[01:20.100]My missionaries in a foreign field
[01:23.400]For some reason I can't explain
[01:26.900]Once you go there was never, never an honest word
[01:33.400]That was when I ruled the world
[01:49.900]It was the wicked and wild wind
[01:54.070]Blew down the doors to let me in
[01:57.800]Shattered windows and the sound of drums
[02:01.059]People couldn't believe what I'd become
[02:04.359]Revolutionaries wait
[02:08.480]For my head on a silver plate
[02:11.598]Just a puppet on a lonely string
[02:15.680]Oh who would ever want to be king?
[02:19.148]I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
[02:22.558]Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
[02:26.038]Be my mirror my sword and shield
[02:30.248]My missionaries in a foreign field
[02:34.070]For some reason I can't explain
[02:37.148]I know Saint Peter won't call my name
[02:40.408]Never an honest word
[02:43.748]But that was when I ruled the world
[03:00.188]Oooooh Oooooh Oooooh...
[03:16.388]I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
[03:19.077]Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
[03:22.568]Be my mirror my sword and shield
[03:26.128]My missionaries in a foreign field
[03:29.498]For some reason I can't explain
[03:32.798]I know Saint Peter won't call my name
[03:36.098]Never an honest word
[03:39.288]But that was when I ruled the world
[03:42.728]Oooooh Oooooh Oooooh
[03:51.589]Oooooh Oooooh Oooooh...
tlyric:
[00:13.700]我曾经统治世界
[00:16.548]只要我一个口令就能使海水升起
[00:19.388]如今的早晨只剩我独自环顾四周
[00:23.509]环视每条曾经属于我的街道
[00:40.700]过去只要我转动手中的骰子
[00:44.550]就能感受到敌人眼中的恐惧
[00:48.600]听着人民传颂着
[00:51.470]旧王朝被推翻了！新国王万岁！
[00:54.620]前一刻我还握着世界之钥
[00:58.520]下一秒世界却从我手中消失
[01:01.450]原来我所竖立的城堡
[01:05.360]只是不堪一击的砂城
[01:09.300]我听见耶路撒冷的钟声响起
[01:13.010]罗马的骑兵唱诗班正在吟唱着
[01:16.500]请成为我的镜子 我的刀与盾
[01:20.100]我的传教士流亡在外
[01:23.400]我无法解释原因为何
[01:26.900]但是只要你来过 将会发现这里没有诚实的语言
[01:33.400]那就是我曾经统治的世界
[01:49.900]当时刮起邪恶的狂风
[01:54.070]吹垮所有入口的城门让我进入
[01:57.800]窗户上震碎的玻璃 发出阵阵巨响
[02:01.059]人民无法置信我成为他们的国王
[02:04.359]革命者伺机而动
[02:08.480]等着我的头颅作为祭品
[02:11.598]我只是绑着一条细弦的傀儡
[02:15.680]噢 谁会想成为这样的国王
[02:19.148]我听见耶路撒冷的钟声响起
[02:22.558]罗马的骑兵唱诗班正在吟唱着
[02:26.038]请成为我的镜子 我的刀与盾
[02:30.248]我的传教士流亡在外
[02:34.070]我无法解释原因为何
[02:37.148]我知道圣彼得不会呼唤我的名字”（指自己上不了天堂）
[02:40.408]不曾有过真诚两个字
[02:43.748]但那就是我曾经统治的世界
[03:00.188]喔~~~~~~
[03:16.388]我听见耶路撒冷的钟声响起
[03:19.077]罗马的骑兵唱诗班正在吟唱着
[03:22.568]请成为我的镜子 我的刀与盾
[03:26.128]我的传教士流亡在外
[03:29.498]我无法解释原因为何
[03:32.798]我知道圣彼得不会呼唤我的名字”（指自己上不了天堂）
[03:36.098]不曾有过真诚两个字
[03:39.288]但那就是我曾经统治的世界
[03:42.728]喔~~~~~~
[03:51.589]喔~~~~~~
